author: RTÉ News
title: Covid-19: Taoiseach announces further restrictions
description: Taoiseach Leo Varadkar has said that from midnight tonight and for a two-week period, everybody must stay at home, except in specific circumstances.
content:
Taoiseach Leo Varadkar has said that from midnight tonight until 12 April, everybody must stay at home except in specific circumstances.
He made the announcement in an update on the Government's response to the coronavirus pandemic at a press conference at G… [+4045 chars]
